item.title: ‘Fantastic Four’ Box Office: ‘First Steps’ Pacing for $120M-$125M Launch in Notable Win for Marvel
item.description: Outside of ‘Deadpool & Wolverine,’ the reboot looks to score the best domestic opening for Kevin Feige’s superhero studio since 2022’s ‘Black Panther: Wakanda Forever.’

item.title: Pedro Pascal Downplays Reed Richards Becoming the New Leader of the Avengers in ‘Doomsday’: ‘That’s a Little Bit of a Mislead’
item.description: Pedro Pascal is the Marvel Cinematic Universe’s Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic, but he is not the new leader of the Avengers. At least that’s what the actor says… for now. An intervi

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Marvelous $24.4M in Box Office Previews
item.description: The acclaimed movie scored the top preview of the year to date and the best since fellow Marvel superhero pic ‘Deadpool & Wolverine’ exactly a year ago.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Marvelous $24.4M in Box Office Previews
item.description: The acclaimed movie scored the top preview of the year to date and the best since fellow Marvel superhero pic ‘Deadpool & Wolverine’ exactly a year ago.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Promising $24.4M in Box Office Previews as Marvel Seeks Redemption
item.description: The acclaimed movie — which scored the top preview of the year to date ahead of ‘Superman’ - features an all-star cast led by Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn and Vincent Ebon Moss-Bachrach.

item.description: The acclaimed movie — which scored the top preview of the year to date ahead of ‘Superman’ - features an all-star cast led by Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn and Vincent Ebon Moss-Bachrach.

item.title: Why Pedro Pascal Never Wants to Be Clean Shaven for a Role Ever Again Unless It’s “Completely Necessary”
item.description: The actor previously shaved his face for 2020’s ‘Wonder Woman 1984.’

item.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Review: Marvel Gets Its Mojo Back With a Satisfying Retro-Styled Reboot
item.description: Fourth time’s the charm. First there was the low-budget version of “The Fantastic Four,” produced by Roger Corman, which Marvel managed to bury before it hit theaters (though bootlegs abound). The com

item.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Review: Pedro Pascal and Vanessa Kirby Lead Appealing New Crew to Break Marvel Property’s Six-Decade Curse
item.description: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Joseph Quinn and Julia Garner also star in Matt Shakman’s superhero adventure, in which the team must save Earth from a “Devourer of Worlds.”

item.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Review: Pedro Pascal and Vanessa Kirby Lead Appealing New Crew to Break Marvel Property’s Six-Decade Curse
item.description: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Joseph Quinn and Julia Garner also star in Matt Shakman’s superhero adventure, in which the team must save Earth from a “Devourer of Worlds.”

item.title: Joseph Quinn Wants a Marvel Team-Up With Tom Holland: “He’s Our Best-Ever Spider-Man”
item.description: Quinn, who plays Johnny Storm/Human Torch in ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps,’ joined Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby and Ebon Moss-Bachrach at their film’s L.A. premiere.

item.title: Joseph Quinn Wants a Marvel Team-Up With Tom Holland: “He’s Our Best-Ever Spider-Man”
item.description: Quinn, who plays Johnny Storm/Human Torch in ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps,’ joined Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby and Ebon Moss-Bachrach at their film’s L.A. premiere.
